board.title: My awesome example noticeboard
board.description: This awesome example board shows a bunch of notices that demonstrate the cool features that Keijiban has.

topics.suggestionText: Got a suggestion for a topic? Get in touch with

venue.text: The venue will be {location}. We hope to see you there!
